tool_description: API to Fetch past questions from various universities/ higher institutions across Nigeria
name: Nigeria University Past Questions
title: Nigeria University Past Questions

api_list.name: Past Question Detail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigeria-university-past-questions.p.rapidapi.com/past_question/1/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigeria-university-past-questions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
